mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.app_id AS "appId", a.app_secret AS "appSecret", a.app_name AS "appName", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_app( id, app_id, app_secret, app_name, create_by, create_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{appId}, #{appSecret}, #{appName}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_app SET id = #{id}, app_id = #{appId}, app_secret = #{appSecret}, app_name = #{appName}, create_by = #{createBy.id}, create_date = #{createDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, del_flag = #{delFlag} WHERE id = #{id}
